page.title: 06INDUSTRY IN AINTREE (1)
page.content:
A survey was conducted of the industry on the{Long Lane Industrial Estate}in {Aintree}(see photograph A). We found out that most of the firms were quite small. They do not employ many people. There were about the same number of firms which manufacture goods as those which provide a service.
We followed this up by visits to six firms. An example of the sort of service industry is{N.Hanlon.}There they fit the equipment for the ambulances such as sirens, seats, and stretchers. They would complete in this way fifteen ambulances a week.
One of the firms visited was a manufacturing firm called{W.Flanagan & {Son Ltd.}(see Page 7)
